text: Give Me a Call is a song written by Pauline Kamusewu, Johan Wetterberg och Michel Zitron, and recorded by Pauline Kamusewu on her 2009 album I Never Said I Was An Angel. The song charted at Svensktoppen for two weeks. before leaving chart. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2009) !Peak position |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2009) !Position |- |Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|86 |} == References == Category:2009 singles Category:English-language Swedish songs Category:2009 songs Category:Songs written by Michel Zitron Category:Pauline Kamusewu songs
title: Give Me a Call (song)
